rules_text:
Choose one–
• [b][Exile up to one target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.][/b]
• [b][Scry 2, then draw a card.][/b]
• [b][Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.][/b]
Impetus {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard as a sorcery with only the text in square brackets for {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Then exile it.)[/i]
